snippet.title: XOXO Blood Droplets Trailer
snippet.description:
The promotional trailer for XOXO Blood Droplets, a horror Visual Novel developed by GB Patch Games.

Feel free to check out our social media pages-
PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/gbpatch
TUMBLR: https://gb-patch.tumblr.com/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/patch_games
DISCORD COMMUNITY: https://discord.gg/Q9YvQx2
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GBPatchGames

XOXO Blood Droplets is a cute, comedic, and creepy Visual Novel. The goal is to somehow romance a murderous boy without having the crazy dudes you didn't pick (or even the one you did) end your life. It doesn't tend to go well. In fact, usually it's pretty horrific.

The trailer was created by the talented aryaford
